They enable individuals to authenticate themselves or assert specific attributes without compromising their privacy. The approach proposed in reference [2] explores the use of anonymous credentials in a broader context, possibly in relation to blockchain technology and decentralized systems.By introducing the notion of loading credentials with sats, the email suggests incorporating the use of Bitcoin's smallest unit, satoshis, into the anonymous credentials framework.
